text: I could add an user using /etc/passwd as the e-mail address

text:
Should we a kind of validate method for the admin area where we could add some
e.g regex for each field? Any usecase in the admin area should first validate
its entry against the regex. Does that make sense?
creator: jann.forrer@id.unizh.ch
